name: Ellen Whitaker's Horse Life
description:
Back of Case - Nintendo DS (UK) (from Ad Blurbs)

My Horse:

Choose your favorite horse from 7 different breeds and personalise it with amazing coloured accessories.

My World:

Take a ride on your horse and explore different countries and environments at a speed you choose, from gentle walk to a fast gallop.

My Championship:

Work as hard as possible with your horse to ensure that together you become the ultimate champions! Enjoy winning rosettes and cups to show off to all your friends!
